00003 \textcolor{comment}{## @file MainUnit.py}
00004 \textcolor{comment}{#   Arquivo responsável pela devida execução e estruturação do programa.}
00005 \textcolor{comment}{#}
00006 \textcolor{comment}{#   Aqui reside a Factory, a classe que deve montar a estrutura do resto}
00007 \textcolor{comment}{#   do programa, para que ele execute da forma correta, bem como outros}
00008 \textcolor{comment}{#   blocos fundamentais para o funcionamento do sistema como um todo.}

00041     \textcolor{comment}{## Classe que redireciona para a devida home.}
00042     \textcolor{comment}{#   Caso o usuário já esteja devidamente logado, redireciona para o}
00043     \textcolor{comment}{#   profile, caso contrário, vai para a página de login.}
00044     @vary\_on\_cookie
\hypertarget{MainUnit_8py_source_l00045}{}\hyperlink{classELO_1_1MainUnit_1_1Factory_a766943202ba781821cf749ca0fb133ba}{00045}     \textcolor{keyword}{def }\hyperlink{classELO_1_1MainUnit_1_1Factory_a766943202ba781821cf749ca0fb133ba}{runHome}(self, request, entity):
00046         \textcolor{keywordflow}{if} \textcolor{stringliteral}{'user'} \textcolor{keywordflow}{in} request.session.keys():
00047             \textcolor{keywordflow}{if} request.session[\textcolor{stringliteral}{'user'}][\textcolor{stringliteral}{'type'}] == \textcolor{stringliteral}{"Adm"}:
00048                 \textcolor{keywordflow}{return} self.\hyperlink{classELO_1_1MainUnit_1_1Factory_a533b402a54bf6f6715824a8687fa7a24}{runAdm}(request)
00049             \textcolor{keywordflow}{else}:
00050                 \textcolor{keywordflow}{return} self.\hyperlink{classELO_1_1MainUnit_1_1Factory_ab20a76f74180fc77c6b8fcd8de7942f1}{runProfile}(request, acctype=\textcolor{stringliteral}{'Home'})
00051         \textcolor{keywordflow}{else}:
00052             \textcolor{keywordflow}{return} self.\hyperlink{classELO_1_1MainUnit_1_1Factory_a515d1ff460a335b750e58e0cbddf20ae}{runLogin}(request, entity)
00053 
00054     \textcolor{comment}{## Classe que executa o módulo de login.}
00055     \textcolor{comment}{#   Define as camadas de persistência, negócio de login e}
00056     \textcolor{comment}{#   apresentação e verifica o tipo de usuário.}
00057     @vary\_on\_cookie
\hypertarget{MainUnit_8py_source_l00058}{}\hyperlink{classELO_1_1MainUnit_1_1Factory_a515d1ff460a335b750e58e0cbddf20ae}{00058}     \textcolor{keyword}{def }\hyperlink{classELO_1_1MainUnit_1_1Factory_a515d1ff460a335b750e58e0cbddf20ae}{runLogin}(self, request, entity):
00059         \textcolor{keywordflow}{if} \textcolor{keywordflow}{not} isinstance(self.\hyperlink{classELO_1_1MainUnit_1_1Factory_a189a44a11e1a66ba69663eb2c598dd7c}{\_\_ui}, IfUiLogin):
00060             self.\hyperlink{classELO_1_1MainUnit_1_1Factory_a68f6640ad3b515e1b8cd48d1554c0779}{\_\_pers} = \hyperlink{classLogin_1_1LoginUnit_1_1PersLogin}{PersLogin}()
00061             self.\hyperlink{classELO_1_1MainUnit_1_1Factory_a6a0b7b93046e095779ba54e0a8a4d02c}{\_\_bus} = \hyperlink{classLogin_1_1LoginUnit_1_1BusLogin}{BusLogin}(self.\hyperlink{classELO_1_1MainUnit_1_1Factory_a68f6640ad3b515e1b8cd48d1554c0779}{\_\_pers})
00062             self.\hyperlink{classELO_1_1MainUnit_1_1Factory_a189a44a11e1a66ba69663eb2c598dd7c}{\_\_ui} = \hyperlink{classLogin_1_1LoginUnit_1_1UiLogin}{UiLogin}(self.\hyperlink{classELO_1_1MainUnit_1_1Factory_a6a0b7b93046e095779ba54e0a8a4d02c}{\_\_bus})
00063 
00064         \textcolor{keywordflow}{if} entity == \textcolor{stringliteral}{"Adm"}:
00065             database = Adm
00066         \textcolor{keywordflow}{elif} entity == \textcolor{stringliteral}{"Professor"}:
00067             database = Professor
00068         \textcolor{keywordflow}{elif} entity == \textcolor{stringliteral}{"Student"}:
00069             database = Student
00070         \textcolor{keywordflow}{else}:
00071             database = \textcolor{keywordtype}{None}
00072 
00073         \textcolor{keywordflow}{return} self.\_\_ui.run(request, database)

00075     \textcolor{comment}{## Classe que executa o logout.}
00076     \textcolor{comment}{#   Finaliza a sessão do usuário e redireciona para }
00077     \textcolor{comment}{#   a página de login.}
\hypertarget{MainUnit_8py_source_l00078}{}\hyperlink{classELO_1_1MainUnit_1_1Factory_aa26c51486ba65030399897a6e3b4f4f1}{00078}     \textcolor{keyword}{def }\hyperlink{classELO_1_1MainUnit_1_1Factory_aa26c51486ba65030399897a6e3b4f4f1}{runLogout}(self, request):
00079         \textcolor{keywordflow}{if} \textcolor{stringliteral}{'user'} \textcolor{keywordflow}{in} request.session.keys():
00080             del request.session[\textcolor{stringliteral}{'user'}]
00081         \textcolor{keywordflow}{return} self.\hyperlink{classELO_1_1MainUnit_1_1Factory_a515d1ff460a335b750e58e0cbddf20ae}{runLogin}(request, \textcolor{stringliteral}{"Student"})
00082 
00083     \textcolor{comment}{## Classe que executa a página inicial do módulo de Perfil.}
00084     \textcolor{comment}{#   Define as camadas de persistência, negócio e apresentação de}
00085     \textcolor{comment}{#   perfil e proíbe o acesso de usuários não logados no sistema.}
00086     \textcolor{comment}{#}
00087     \textcolor{comment}{#   @arg acctype    Define o tipo de acesso que o usuário está requerindo.}
00088     \textcolor{comment}{#                   "Full": Acessa o Perfil completo, com possibilidade de}
00089     \textcolor{comment}{#                       edição. Caso a chamada seja assíncrona, retorna a}
00090     \textcolor{comment}{#                       form de edição do campo específico.}
00091     \textcolor{comment}{#                   "Home": Acessa o Perfil resumido, a home do site em si.}
00092     @vary\_on\_cookie
\hypertarget{MainUnit_8py_source_l00093}{}\hyperlink{classELO_1_1MainUnit_1_1Factory_ab20a76f74180fc77c6b8fcd8de7942f1}{00093}     \textcolor{keyword}{def }\hyperlink{classELO_1_1MainUnit_1_1Factory_ab20a76f74180fc77c6b8fcd8de7942f1}{runProfile}(self, request, acctype, field=None):
00094         \textcolor{keywordflow}{if} \textcolor{stringliteral}{'user'} \textcolor{keywordflow}{in} request.session.keys(): \textcolor{comment}{# is user logged?}
00095             user\_type = request.session[\textcolor{stringliteral}{'user'}][\textcolor{stringliteral}{'type'}]
00096             \textcolor{keywordflow}{if} user\_type == \textcolor{stringliteral}{'Professor'} \textcolor{keywordflow}{or} user\_type == \textcolor{stringliteral}{'Student'}:
00097                 \textcolor{keywordflow}{if} \textcolor{keywordflow}{not} isinstance(self.\hyperlink{classELO_1_1MainUnit_1_1Factory_a189a44a11e1a66ba69663eb2c598dd7c}{\_\_ui}, IfUiProfile):
00098                     self.\hyperlink{classELO_1_1MainUnit_1_1Factory_a68f6640ad3b515e1b8cd48d1554c0779}{\_\_pers} = \hyperlink{classProfile_1_1ProfileUnit_1_1PersProfile}{PersProfile}()
00099                     self.\hyperlink{classELO_1_1MainUnit_1_1Factory_a6a0b7b93046e095779ba54e0a8a4d02c}{\_\_bus} = \hyperlink{classProfile_1_1ProfileUnit_1_1BusProfile}{BusProfile}(self.\hyperlink{classELO_1_1MainUnit_1_1Factory_a68f6640ad3b515e1b8cd48d1554c0779}{\_\_pers})
00100                 \textcolor{keywordflow}{if} acctype == \textcolor{stringliteral}{"Full"}:
00101                     self.\hyperlink{classELO_1_1MainUnit_1_1Factory_a189a44a11e1a66ba69663eb2c598dd7c}{\_\_ui} = \hyperlink{classProfile_1_1ProfileUnit_1_1UiFullProfile}{UiFullProfile}(self.\hyperlink{classELO_1_1MainUnit_1_1Factory_a6a0b7b93046e095779ba54e0a8a4d02c}{\_\_bus})
00102                 \textcolor{keywordflow}{elif} acctype == \textcolor{stringliteral}{"Home"}:
00103                     self.\hyperlink{classELO_1_1MainUnit_1_1Factory_a189a44a11e1a66ba69663eb2c598dd7c}{\_\_ui} = \hyperlink{classProfile_1_1ProfileUnit_1_1UiHomeProfile}{UiHomeProfile}(self.\hyperlink{classELO_1_1MainUnit_1_1Factory_a6a0b7b93046e095779ba54e0a8a4d02c}{\_\_bus})
00104                 \textcolor{keywordflow}{else}:
00105                     \textcolor{keywordflow}{raise} Http404(lang.DICT[\textcolor{stringliteral}{"EXCEPTION\_404\_ERR"}])
00106             
00107                 \textcolor{keywordflow}{if} field \textcolor{keywordflow}{and} acctype == \textcolor{stringliteral}{"Full"}:
00108                     \textcolor{keywordflow}{return} self.\_\_ui.run(request, field)
00109                 \textcolor{keywordflow}{else}:
00110                     \textcolor{keywordflow}{return} self.\_\_ui.run(request)
00111             \textcolor{keywordflow}{else}:
00112                 \textcolor{keywordflow}{raise} Http404(lang.DICT[\textcolor{stringliteral}{"EXCEPTION\_404\_ERR"}])
00113         \textcolor{keywordflow}{else}:
00114             \textcolor{keywordflow}{raise} PermissionDenied(lang.DICT[\textcolor{stringliteral}{"EXCEPTION\_403\_STD"}])
00115
